title: Create Pod with Readiness Probe
description: Create a Pod named ||ready-pod|| in Namespace ||default|| using image ||nginx:1.21|| with a TCP readiness probe on port ||80|| with initial delay of ||10|| seconds.

steps: 2. Edit YAML to add readinessProbe with tcpSocket on port 80, initialDelaySeconds: 10

validations.description: Pod should have readiness probe on port 80
